attachments.title: Where the Sounds From the World's Favorite Movies Are Born
attachments.text: WIRED gets a tour from veteran Foley artist John Roesch of the Skywalker's custom built soundstage. Roesch reveals some of the strangest audio props that were used in films like 'Who Framed Roger Rabbit,' 'Back to the Future' and 'Braveheartâ€™.
